p: The data were analyzed by age, sex, >50% leg ulcer area healing over the 4 weeks of the intervention, occurrence of at least one VOC within 12 months preceding the treatment intervention, PHTN (confirmed by right heart catheterization), or AVN (documented by imaging). PCS and MCS scores were averaged for each subgroup. Statistical analyses of the mean summary scores were performed with paired or unpaired Student t tests with significance defined as P < .05. Statistical analyses were conducted using the statistical software StatPlus (version 6.0, AnalystSoft, Inc.).
